ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: A.M.G. recognize the financial support by a grant from the Romanian National Authority for Scientific Research and Innovation, UEFISCDI, project number 45PCCDI/2018-PN-III-P1-1.2-PCCDI-2017-0749-Nanostructuri bioactive pentru strategii terapeutice inovatoare. I.N. and V.G. acknowledge with thanks to National Authority for Research and Innovation in the frame of Nucleus Programmeâ€“contract 3N/2018.
